text: Describe your organization's CUI handling procedures and compliance with 32 CFR Part 2002.
answer: We are compliant with NIST 800-171 rev. 2.

text: Do you maintain Software Bills of Materials (SBOM) for all products? Provide details.
answer: We maintain Software Bills of Materials (SBOMs) for all products, as required by our System Security Plan (SSP) and in alignment with NIST SP 800-171 and DFARS 252.204-7012.

text: Outline your organization's cyber incident reporting process under DFARS 252.204-7012.
answer: The organization's cyber incident reporting process under DFARS 252.204-7012 involves immediate notification to relevant stakeholders in the event of a security incident affecting Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI). The process is documented in the System Security Plan (SSP) and is subject to regular review and updates.

text: Explain your supply chain risk management (SCRM) program and vendor vetting.
answer: Our organization has a formal supply chain risk management (SCRM) program in place to ensure the protection of Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI). This program aligns with NIST SP 800-171 and DFARS 252.204-7012 requirements for safeguarding CUI.
